Title: Comin' Round the Mountain
Description:
The mountain pass is very dangerous. You need much luck to survive. Nephew Bentnail will show you the way.

Perhaps today is a lucky day to travel though. Wind blows from the east; this is good sign. Grummles always travel best when east wind blows.

Climb in the cart when you are ready to leave.
ObjectivesText: Escort the cart and guides safely up Neverest Mountain.
RewardText: You've arrived just in time, $c! I was starting to think I would die up here!
